definitions.definition: a room, group of rooms, or building in which someone may live or stay.
examples: the cost includes airfare and hotel accommodations
the company offers a number of guesthouse accommodations in Cape Cod

definitions.definition: the available space for occupants in a building, vehicle, or vessel.
examples: there was lifeboat accommodation for 1,178 people

definitions.definition: the provision of a room or lodging.
examples: the building is used exclusively for the accommodation of guests

definitions.definition: a convenient arrangement; a settlement or compromise.
examples: management was seeking an accommodation with labor
synonyms: compromise "an accommodation between the two parties was reached"

definitions.definition: the process of adapting or adjusting to someone or something.
examples: accommodation to a separate political entity was not possible
synonyms: acculturation; inurement "their accommodations to changing economic circumstances"

definitions.definition: the automatic adjustment of the focus of the eye by flattening or thickening of the lens.
